Connect, monitor, and control millions of IoT assets, increase the security of IoT solutions

Connect, monitor, and control millions of IoT assets

  • Quick Start
  • Connect millions of IoT assets
  • Supports a variety of operating systems and protocols
  • Establish reliable two-way communication
  • Increase the security of IoT solutions

Establish two-way communication with millions of IoT devices

Easily connect IoT assets with Azure IoT Hub. Use device-to-cloud telemetry to find out the status devices and assets and take immediate action as soon as devices need attention. Reliably send instructions and notifications to connected devices using cloud-to-device messaging, and track message delivery using confirmation receipts. Adapt to intermittently connected devices by sending device messages with persistent methods.

Use familiar platforms and protocols

Add new devices and connect existing devices with open source device SDKs that work on multiple platforms (including Linux, Windows and real-time operating systems). Use standard protocols and custom protocols including HTTP, Advanced Message Queuing Protocol (AMQP) and Message Queuing Telemetry Transport (MQTT).

Increase the security of IoT solutions with authentication for every device

Set identifiers and credentials for each connected device to help you keep cloud-to-device and device-to-cloud messages confidential. To maintain system integrity, please revoke access permissions for specific devices.

Manage IoT devices on a large scale using device management

Using Azure IoT Hubâ€™s device management function, administrators can remotely maintain, update and manage IoT devices on a large scale, eliminating the need to develop and maintain custom device management solutions and expend further resources on maintaining global assets, and delivering savings in terms of both time and costs.

Make use of the intelligent edge via the Azure IoT gateway SDK

The IoT SDK provides a powerful framework to generate, configure and deploy edge logic, enabling you to do even more with Azure IoT. Whether you are choosing strategies or other data processing to connect to old devices, reduce bandwidth costs or improve security, the IoT Gateway SDK simplifies the deployment process, so that you can focus on the issues that really matter. Find out more about Azure IoT Gateway SDK.
